Projects

Welcome to my Projects page! Here, you'll find a curated showcase of my work, reflecting my diverse interests and the culmination of my academic and professional journey. Among these projects, you'll find my capstone, was a consulting project where my team's client was the Academy of Motion Picture Arts and Sciences! My portfolio spans across various domains, but I am particularly passionate about the intersections of medicine and music with my love for software development. Each project here not only demonstrates my skills and creativity but also my commitment to exploring and improving technology in fields that deeply impact our lives. Dive in to discover how I blend technical expertise with my passions to create solutions that aim to make a meaningful difference. Due to ongoing patenting efforts and privacy concerns, I am unable publish my code, however, if you have any questions about my projects or are interested in learning more feel free to reach out to me!

  • InFrame - Representation in Film

    A web application designed for the Academy of Motion Picture Arts and Sciences to help them organize film data about underrepresented minorities.

  • DiaTrack

    A simple all-in-one solution designed to help diabetic patients keep track of their health history and to provide access to nearby pharmacies.

  • Pulse

    A mobile application designed to connect citizens in distress and first responders to streamline rescue efforts and first aid.

  • Ez-Compose

    A musicianâ€™s best friend! This mobile application is designed to help musicians write music by live composing during jam sessions.
